message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the highest I can go.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but $6,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm aiming for. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit far from $10,000. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $7,500. Can we meet at this point?
